alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:42AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, St. James, west central St. Charles, northwestern Terrebonne, northwestern Lafourche and southeastern Assumption Parishes through 515 AM CDT... At 442 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Schriever, or 10 miles southwest of Thibodaux, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Gramercy, Lutcher, Schriever, Gray, Des Allemands, South Vacherie, Convent, North Vacherie, Wallace, Supreme, Raceland, Chackbay, Bayou Gauche, Labadieville, Bayou Cane, Garyville, Paradis and Edgard. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 193 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
